'''''SEVEN 9''''' is the ninth volume of the [[Marion E. Wade Center]]'s annual journal ''[[SEVEN]]'', published in [[1988]].<ref name="jstor" /> Volume 9 is also the ''Williams Centenary Issue'', celebrating the centenary year of British writer [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Charles_Williams_(British_writer) Charles Williams].<ref name="vii">{{webcite|articleurl=https://journals.wheaton.edu/index.php/vii/article_index|articlename=Contents By Volume|website=[https://journals.wheaton.edu/index.php/vii/index VII: Journal of the Marion E. Wade Center]|accessed=13 August 2025}}</ref>

**By: Christopher Dean

**By: [[Owen Barfield]]
